segments.text: Car trouble center . How may I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My car won ’ t start ! Stupid old car !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hold on , before you kick your car let ’ s go through some possible problems .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , first of all , can you turn the key in the ignition ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah ! I am here with my friend and he thinks it may be the spark plug or the starter motor .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Those are possible problems , but tell me , when you turn the key , do you hear the starter motor crank ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , it sounds like it usually does when I start the car , but nothing else happens . The engine won ’ t start . Should I maybe press the accelerator ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . If you step on the accelerator pedal you can flood the carburetor and your car will never start .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So what do you think it is ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know this may seem like a silly question , but does your car have gasoline ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Umm . yeah ! Right ! I got the car started ! Thanks for your help ! I told you to fill the tank !
segments.speaker: S2
